name: chorus-file-tools
description: Sandboxed file operations for Chorus agents

scripts.build: gren make ChorusToolsMain --output=build/chorus-tools-tmp && tail -n +2 build/chorus-tools-tmp > build/chorus-tools.js && bun build --compile build/chorus-tools.js --outfile build/chorus-tools && rm build/chorus-tools-tmp build/chorus-tools.js
